comment: A simple graph is complete iff the set of vertices is the set of universal vertices. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Oct-2017.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2020.)
